personal.name: Mohamed Ben Rhaiem
personal.role:
Senior Full-Stack Engineer 
| Technical Leader & Software Architect

presentation: A highly skilled full-stack engineer with deep expertise across multiple programming languages and technologies, focused on developing high-quality, scalable software solutions, usually open to new opportunities and looking to join a dynamic and innovative team to use my expertise in designing and developing software solutions to help the company to achieve its goals.

about.summary: Over the past 10 years, I have consistently demonstrated the ability to quickly grasp complex systems, identify critical issues, and drive improvements that enhance both performance and user experience.With a strong foundation in software methodologies and a collaborative leadership style, I excel in aligning teams with project goals and timelines. Since earning my Software Engineering degree in 2014, I have gained experience across various industries, including digital advertising,flight monitoring, e-learning, finance, job-seeking platforms, and audit systems. Over the last five years, I have taken on senior roles as a technical leader and software architect. However, my passion remains full-stack development, where I stay actively involved throughout the entire software development lifecycle—from discovery to deployment and maintenance.My core technical strengths include Java, Node.js, React, and Angular, and I bring an in-depth understanding of modern tech stacks to every project. I’m committed to delivering exceptional software solutions and fostering strong collaboration within teams.

subskills: Event, REST and SOAP Web Services

skills.skill: AWS lamdda, RDS, S3, EC2, Vpc network, Api gateway
Google app engine, Apigee, Build, Strorage, Vpc network, Run

work_experiences.description: As a contractor, led the delivery of analytics data to enhance insight into flight monitoring and improve operational decision-making.
accomplishments: Data-Driven Insights: Developed a real-time system that analyzed flight data, providing critical insights and generating health alerts that improved flight safety and operational efficiency.
System Decomposition: Spearheaded the deconstruction of legacy monolith applications into microservices, optimizing system maintainability, and scalability, and reducing deployment time by 90%.
Performance Improvements: Optimized data pipelines using Kafka and Spark, reducing data processing latency by 50%, and allowing faster analytics and alert delivery.

work_experiences.description: Contractor role focused on developing new features and improving the job seeker system for enhanced user experience and platform efficiency.
accomplishments: Feature Development: Delivered key sprint tasks, translating client requirements into robust features for the job seeker application.
Bug Resolution: Identified, diagnosed, and resolved critical issues in the resume search application, improving system reliability and reducing time response by 20%.
Component Reusability: Developed reusable services and components for both backend and frontend applications, streamlining development efforts and accelerating feature delivery by 99%.

work_experiences.description: Led an IT team to migrate and modernize the internal advertising distribution system while also designing a B2B bonus advertising platform, focusing on improving scalability, performance, and development efficiency.
accomplishments: System Migration and Modernization: Led the successful migration of the advertising distribution system to a more scalable architecture, improving system reliability and reducing response time by 50%.
Development Standards: Established and enforced coding standards, technology choices, and workflow processes that enhanced collaboration and improved code quality across multiple projects.
CI/CD Optimization: Designed and implemented CI/CD pipeline templates tailored to various project types, reducing deployment times by 45% and enhancing the quality of software releases.

Reusable Components: Developed reusable services and components, including a front-end component library and backend project starters, which increased development speed and reduced redundancy across projects.

work_experiences.description: Contributed to the development of a digital education results platform, ensuring seamless integration of logistics and devolution functionalities.
accomplishments: Technical Leadership: Developed detailed technical product specifications with a strong focus on system integration and feasibility, ensuring smooth collaboration between teams and optimized platform performance.

Agile Development: Worked in an Agile environment with weekly iterations, adapting swiftly to client needs and delivering high-priority features on time, leading to improved client satisfaction and faster feedback loops.

Platform Optimization: Enhanced platform performance and scalability by refactoring backend services and implementing best practices, reducing response times by 50% and improving overall system stability.

work_experiences.description: Contributed to the development and delivery of key digital banking features, focusing on prepaid card issuance and money transfer functionalities.
accomplishments: Micro Front-End Standards: Led the definition and adoption of micro front-end architecture standards, enhancing code reusability and enabling smoother integration across multiple banking features.
Feature Delivery: Delivered critical digital banking features that streamlined prepaid card issuance and money transfer processes, improving user experience and reducing operational overhead by 69%.

work_experiences.description: Designed, developed, and maintained critical features for an audit and banking system, ensuring high-quality deliverables and enhanced system efficiency.
accomplishments: Bank Account Online System: Architected and developed the complete environment for the Bank Account Online process, improving system performance, scalability, and security, leading to an 80% increase in customer satisfaction and a 20% reduction in processing times.
Mobile Application Development: Led the development of a mobile app for public guaranty fund management, streamlining workflows and decreasing process time by 80%.

Client Issue Resolution: Efficiently resolved high-priority client bugs and system issues, reducing downtime and improving platform stability, which resulted in improved client retention and operational efficiency.
